APS_ACK_Frame_Header.Extended Header: variable (optional, present if Extended Header Present flag is set)
APS_ACK_Frame_Header.Destination Endpoint: uint8 (present unless Ack Format is set)
APS_ACK_Frame_Header.Source Endpoint: uint8 (present unless Ack Format is set)
APS_ACK_Frame_Header.Cluster Identifier: uint16 (present unless Ack Format is set)
APS_ACK_Frame_Header.Profile Identifier: uint16 (present unless Ack Format is set)
APS_ACK_Frame_Header.Block Number: uint8 (optional, present if fragmentation is in use)
APS_ACK_Frame_Header.Ack Bitfield: uint8 (optional, present if fragmentation is in use)
